name: Jumpy Flapper
description:
Try out this brand new rotating platformer created for Kenney Jam 2021 (theme: rotation) in Godot Engine.

Navigate our hero through the maze, avoid obstacles, collect bonuses to make your journey easier (or harder) and find the portal to the next level.

Controls:
Arrows
Space - jumping/flying

Assets:
All graphics assets were made by Kenney. Everything else was custom made.
